pages.text: American Foxhounds were originally bred as scent hounds, primarily for hunting foxes.$(br2)Standing just under a block tall, these loyal dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in taigas and old growth taigas. They can also be found in snowy taigas and old growth birch forests, and more rarely in flower forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon Treat.
